DataElement.preferredName: Comparative Marker Selection Parameter Set Balanced Permutation java.lang.Boolean
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An algorithm for assigning significance values to genes being tested for their ability to discriminate between microarray samples.:Any factor that defines a system and determines (or limits) its performance.:A group of things of the same kind that belong together and are so used._A method for reducing bias in which half of the treatment arrays swap with half of the control arrays in each permutation._Generic value domain for a primitive java datatype that is a Boolean value (true or false).

Property.preferredDefinition: A method for reducing bias in which half of the treatment arrays swap with half of the control arrays in each permutation.

ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: 10.14.20 TL changed WFS from DRAFT NEW to RETIRED ARCHIVED and added an End Date in preparation of OneData.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
